Translations.Text: Apani ki dekhena ni [1] apanara raba hatira adhipatidera prati ki karechilena
tini ki tadera kausala byarthataya paryabasita kare denani
ara [1] tadera birud'dhe tini jhamke jhamke pakhi pathana
yara tadera upara sakta poramatira kankara niksepa kare
Atahpara tini taderake bhaksita trna-sadrsa karena
